name: evaluate
description: A programming language built around a calculator

scripts.build: nasm -f elf64 -g -F dwarf -o output.o output.asm && ld -o output output.o
scripts.test: node index.js test/suite.ev -v --force --disable-warnings -F asm && nasm -f elf64 -g -F dwarf -o output.o output.asm && ld -o output output.o && ./output
